import "./MenuComponent.css"; import { Row,Col, Navbar, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, TabContent, TabPane } from "reactstrap"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { useState } from "react"; export default function MenuComponent(){ var listMenuOfMen = { name: ["wallet","shoes","bags","accessories"], isShowed:false } var listMenuOfWoMen = { name: ["shirt","trousers","bags","accessories"], isShowed:false } const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('2'); const toggle = tab => { if(activeTab !== tab) setActiveTab(tab); } return(

LEONARDO
NEW ARRIVALS { toggle('1'); }}> MEN WOMENT BLOG

 ); }
